data.description:
**NOPE CHALLENGE** transforms your fears into fun with **9 Unique Challenges** centered around **3 Core Phobias**: **Clowns**, **Heights**, and **Spiders**. If things get too intense, tap the **NOPE Button** to enter the calming **Breather Space**, collect rewards, and steady your nerves before diving back in. With each player's unique phobia thresholds, every journey is filled with laughs, screams, and maybe even some swearing. And the best part? It's not just fun to play, but also a blast for friends and family to watch.

Key Features:

- **9 NOPE CHALLENGES**: **Clowns**, **Heights**, and **Spiders** themes, each offering **Light**, **Moderate**, and **Extreme** levels. Start at Light to learn the ropes. Move up to Moderate and Extreme to experience the full progression. Everyone's fear threshold is different, so what’s Light for one might be Extreme for another. We're always listening to feedback, so dive in and let us know what you think!
- **The NOPE Button & Breather Space**: If things get too intense, press the **NOPE Button** to retreat to the **Breather Space**. Rest, recharge, and hang out with **Mr. Peels**, your emotional support banana, before jumping back into the laughter, screams, and swears!
- **Dynamic Progression**: Early challenges guide you through gameplay, but advancing brings in AI-driven characters for unpredictable and intense encounters, making later challenges highly dynamic.
- **Share Your Scare**: Friends and family will have fun watching you push your limits, and cheering you on to see if you can hold off hitting the **NOPE Button!**

changelog.change_log:
NOPE CHALLENGE "SCREAMING SUMMER" - PATCH 2!
We’re excited to bring you the latest update for NOPE CHALLENGE! This "SCREAMING SUMMER" patch includes a variety of fixes, improvements, and a few new features!

HEIGHTS

- LIGHT Challenge: Find the new screaming friend of Mr. Peels. They have a fear of heights and need to be rescued!
- EXTREME Challenge: Fixed the issue where players could get stuck on large white panels if they landed on them.
- EXTREME Challenge: Players will now die if they fall into the dark void below.
- EXTREME Challenge: Resolved the issue with players hitting the YEP button when standing very close to it.
- EXTREME Challenge:  Players no longer get stuck at the top of the ladder near the zipline if they climb too fast.

CLOWNS

- LIGHT Challenge: Fixed the strange issues with the flashlight.
- LIGHT Challenge: Celebration music no longer plays simultaneously with the voiceover.
- MODERATE Challenge: If Phil doesn’t kill you in one hit, the low health notification will no longer continuously beep. 
- EXTREME Challenge: Dioko’s AI has been adjusted so that he teleports less often when lurking player movements.
- Shock Stick: Phil and Dioko can no longer knock the shock stick around.
- Mary: Mary O Nette now has the same face and hair in both LIGHT and EXTREME 

SPIDERS

- LIGHT Challenge: Celebration music no longer plays simultaneously with the voiceover.
- Creature Stun Spray: Increased the power of the Creature Stun Spray. Spiders and cockroaches now stun much faster when used.
- Jumping Spiders: Fixed the issue where jumping spiders caught midair would refuse to stay in containers.

BREATHER SPACES

- Tutorial: Mr. Peels no longer gets accidentally bumped to the floor when lifting the lid to reveal him screaming under the box.
- Tutorial: A new shelf created to help players practice using the “Reach Assist” ability.
- Tutorial:  Fixed the issue where players could climb back into the tutorial area before the trapdoor closed, trapping them inside.
- Menu: Added functionality to check if LIGHT and MODERATE challenges have been completed if EXTREME is chosen.
- Guides: Added signs to direct players to the Trophy Hut, Information Station, and NOPE CHALLENGE Kiosk.
- Hungry Koi Fish: Fixed the issue where the Koi were not eating the treats thrown into the water. They now go after everything! They are quite hungry.
- Trophies Now Stay: Trophies now retain their placement made by the player and no longer rearrange themselves. 
- Trophy Lost & Found: Trophy “Lost & Found” Bin added - If you decide to yeet your trophies into the ocean, now you can always get them back!
- Trophies: Fixed the collision issue for the trophy preventing the player from grabbing the one computer chip.

Miscellaneous
- NOPE Button: The Nope Button ring now highlights GREEN when engaged.
- Computer Chips: Fixed the issue where some found computer chips were installed backwards into the NOPE Band.
- Sound FX: Some sound effects have been tweaked.

NEW! Added Teleport Movement: 
Due to high demand, you can now enable this new traversal option from the in-game options menu.

Improved Snap Turn: The delay with Snap Turn has been removed for a smoother experience.

Door Fixes: Addressed issues with doors closing on players and temporarily blocking progression.

Updated Visuals: Various materials and textures have been fixed.

Updated Menu: Indicators now in place to show recommended player progression path for the 9 current NOPE CHALLENGES contained in the initial game’s release.
